textBox.richText: The foundations mini-unit I used to teach at the start of my world history course each year involved a whirlwind overview of philosophies, religious systems, scientific thought and types of government. The links I am putting here are for that purpose, not in-depth studies. I have tried to put together a good collection, but of course I am not an expert in this field and would really appreciate thoughtful input. Links Regarding Intellectual & Ethical Foundations of the Modern World
